ca.corefacility.gview.data

Class Slot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.data.Slot

  • public class Slot
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates information about slot numbers.
    Author:
    Aaron Petkau

    • Method Detail

      • inSlotRange

        public static boolean inSlotRange(int realSlot)
        Determines if the passed slot is within the defined max/min real slot numbers.
        Parameters:
        realSlot - The slot to check.
        Returns:
        True if the passed slot is in the valid range for real slot numbers, false otherwise.

      • validSlot

        public static boolean validSlot(int slot)
        Determines if the passed slot is a valid slot number.
        Parameters:
        slot - The slot to check.
        Returns:
        True if it is valid, false otherwise.
